At that time, the Buddha told the bhiká¹£us:
This body has skin, marrow, blood, and flesh, filled with urine and feces. What good do you see in the body when you look at it?
It always has nine orifices and evil diseases;
It is always impure and constantly flowing, enough to be ashamed of.
It always joins with enemies until old age and death;
It also accompanies illness. Why not dislike it?
The body will fall and decay, and when discarded on the ground, it will no longer be used and will be eaten by foxes and wolves. Why not be ashamed when you see this?
Who says to crave lust?
As the Buddha said:
There are few pleasures and many sins. Look at this with your own mind.
Like a butcher's stand or chopping block, it is a pile of bones;
Like a blazing fire;
Like poisonous pain, a fool delights in it, delighting without knowing it.
Why are you not afraid of the net?
Greed and lust lead to delusion. Wealth, money, grain, gold, silver, cattle, horses, and slaves are sought for the sake of life.
Life is in the breath. The original life is also short. At most, one lives for over a hundred years;
It is also painful to come together.
Contemplating this, who can be considered acceptable?
As time passes, life gradually decreases. Life and the days are both exhausted;
Like the swift current of a river, like the sun and moon coming to an end, life passes quickly. When a person's life is gone, it does not return. It is like this, and cannot be obtained.
When a person dies, life leaves. Even if one has some wealth, and seeks the wonders of the world, everything exists, but when death comes, it is not pleasant;
It is also not possible to be disgusted with it;ğŸ”½It is also not possible to enjoy it;
It is also not possible to enjoy oneself without remainder.
One can only do good oneself.
What one does oneself is good, and what one should do naturally.
If one knows that one will die, what kind of joy can there be?
People can fall into lust, even if they live a long life;
If they die, they will surely die.
Why do you love and enjoy together?
Why is it so?
Not thinking of calming oneself, indulging to the fullest extent.
When a child has already died and cried for more than ten days, after ten days, they gradually forget it.
Loving a child and wife is also like this!
Family members, relatives, and acquaintances are also like this!

With hard work, one earns wealth and property, loves one's own body and life, and is extravagant. When a person dies, they abandon everything they have. The body lies on the ground, enters the earth below, and only the five skandhas depart, following one's actions to receive a form and become a human being;

It is like a tree with fruit already seen. In this way, the human mind falls into existence. All the fruits and goods in the world, if one person obtains them, it is not enough. If one obtains a portion, how can one be disgusted and have no number?
Thirty-five pleasures are enjoyed everywhere, but what benefit is there?

When a person has already encountered suffering and seeks to receive the punishment of a criminal, it is what they like, thinking that there is benefit, not wanting to receive tranquility, seeking to be a poison cauldron for oneself, as little or much is also so!
As little or much is also so!
As sickness is large or small, it is also suffering;
It is like a bone without flesh, a dog gets to bite it and does not tire of it.
Like this, the practice of a lustful dog is also difficult to obtain, having obtained it one should fear it greatly.
This practice is not long-lasting, and a person also falls into evil.
It is like a person seeing a dream, having already awakened and not being able to obtain it again, lust is also like this.
As intense as a dream, like a dream there is bliss, like a black cauldron like a hook with meat;
Like a tree fruit, the fruit is few and the taste is many, perishing increases bonds, and is the basis for evil deeds, the Daoist family always does not use it.
This person is in the heavenly house of bliss, also in the heavenly color tree;
Also in the upright and beautiful garden;
Also obtains the heavenly jade woman.
Having already attained the heavens and humans, not being disgusted with the five pleasures of the heavens, how can one now become disgusted with the pleasures of the world?
For the sake of the two hundred bones, the bones are one hundred and twenty segments bound by sinews;
For the sake of the nine orifices that constantly leak;
For the sake of the sixty-three kinds;
For the sake of the extreme of a hundred illnesses;
For the sake of the combination of flesh and blood;
For the sake of the skin and flesh that grow;
For the sake of the cold, heat, and wind in the middle;
For the sake of feces and urine, for the thousand insects that all arise from the body, and for the thousand holes in the middle.
There are also severe cases where one's own relatives are destroyed, and it comes from this impure origin;ğŸ”½From the nose, mucus comes out;
From the mouth, saliva comes out;
From the armpits, sweat flows out;
From the lower orifices, feces and urine come out. Such things all come out from the body in severe ways.
The dead person in the charnel ground is truly disgusting and severe.

The back of the body is an unpleasant place, the impurities of the body are like this, they are the seeds of impurity, from the beginning they are like gold applied to other things, for the sake of clothes, fragrant powder, grease, luster, red cotton, dark eyebrows;
Foolish people see this as the mind being confused.
Like a painted jar, red like a pit covered with grass, loved by people, later regretful.
